channel.title: Just got my first job today
channel.description:
About 30 minuites ago I had my interview. There's a local resturant in my small city, downtown and I applied.
Left with my schduel and uniform, even though it's not high paying it's still a step in the right direction, pretty proud of myself for getting off my ass.
[img]http://i.minus.com/jbnbf5Ka2d1tcd.jpg[/img]
Figured I'd share on here, even though you guys probably don't care. I haven't posted on here for awhile.

item.title: Just got my first job today
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:62, topic:548422”]So this team that you lead just sit on their arses with their thumbs buried knuckle deep for the month you were in jail?[/quote]No I’m employed by an energy company, we sell third party natural gas and solar power setups to peoples houses. My guys are commission based, I’m not. I’m in close ties with the CEO of the company so I’m favored by the company and later on could be seen as an asset to the company.

@Vain, I don’t even have tattoos, lol. Plus, all my snapbacks are stored in plastic tubs right now lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first job today
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:66, topic:548422”]so youre saying 7-9 hours a day (assuming part time as youre 17 or full time?) 20-40 hours a week. youre bringing in “5k” a month?

has this topic turned into whos got the bigger epeen or what? because yall on some other shiit[/quote]
itt people like to lie about what they make

they could at least be logical about it

Maybe everyones country is much different to the UK but if you’re earning over £10 an hour here then you more than likely have spent either all your life at that company, have a degree and are in a white collar job or you’re a time served tradesman.

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first job today
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:52, topic:548422”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=667330.msg4464489#msg4464489 date=1419288556]
Why is it hard to believe someone is making 5k a week? I’m still on my first job raking in about 1.25k a week, for 17 year old I think I’m doing pretty well.
[/quote]what exactly are you doing/hours?

because its highly unrealistic for an average 17 year old to be making 5k a month from a universal job.

[quote author=Chronicles link=topic=667330.msg4464487#msg4464487 date=1419288476]
I work 12 hour shift 3 days in a row, making 5kish a month.
[/quote]33~35$ per hour? what market are you in exactly?[/quote]

start at around 8ish finish around 3ish or 5ish just depends on the day and run. I deliver white goods and brown goods.

Read full topic
item.source: Just got my first job today

item.title: Just got my first job today
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:63, topic:548422”][quote author=Natey link=topic=667330.msg4464552#msg4464552 date=1419313304]

[quote author=Vain_ link=topic=667330.msg4464478#msg4464478 date=1419286071]

[quote author=Natey link=topic=667330.msg4464424#msg4464424 date=1419262325]
Congrats! Wait until those checks come in. Makes it worth it.
Every week I’m starin at a 5k check lol
[/quote]5k a week? 20k a month? 260k a year?

doesnt sound very believeable, but what exactly are you doing…?
[/quote]I lead a sales team I’m a manager of my own small team of 6, along with my co-manager.
It’s for a solar and energy company out here in California. Most of my checks are 3k-5k. I also put A LOT of work in, including working 7 days a week 9am-9pm. I work hard lol. I started from the bottom of the chain and climbed my happy ass to the top.
[/quote]hard to believe you make bank when you got shitty tats and like 3 snapbacks[/quote]
lol’d irl

Read full topic
